channel.title: CVE Feed for Bitdefender -- ENdpoint Security Tools for Windows
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Bitdefender -- ENdpoint Security Tools for Windows

item.title: CVE-2021-3579|2024-08-03T17:01:07.779Z -- bitdefender -- endpoint%20security%20tools%20for%20windows
item.description: Incorrect Default Permissions vulnerability in the bdservicehost.exe and Vulnerability.Scan.exe components as used in Bitdefender Endpoint Security Tools for Windows, Total Security allows a local attacker to elevate privileges to NT AUTHORITY\SYSTEM This issue affects: Bitdefender Endpoint Security Tools for Windows versions prior to 7.2.1.65. Bitdefender Total Security versions prior to 7.2.1.65.
